故事成語: (こじせいご) - (yoji) idiom derived from historical events or classical literature of China
故事来歴: (こじらいれき) - (yoji) origin and history; particulars
故人を偲ぶ: (こじんをしのぶ) - to think of the dead
故意: (こい) - intention/purpose/bad faith; mens rea (guilty mind)
故智: (こち) - the wisdom of the ancients
故有って: (ゆえあって) - for a certain reason; owing to unavoidable circumstances
故知: (こち) - the wisdom of the ancients
故紙: (こし) - used paper; paper for recycling
故老: (ころう) - old people; seniors; elders; old-timer
故買屋: (こばいや) - receiver's shop; pawnshop which knowingly buys stolen goods
故買者: (こばいしゃ) - a fence; dealer in stolen goods
故郷: (furusato) - cidade natal, local de nascimento, terra natal, antiga casa
故郷に錦を飾る: (こきょうににしきをかざる) - to come home in triumph; to return to one's hometown in glory
故郷へ錦を飾る: (こきょうへにしきをかざる) - to come home in triumph; to return to one's hometown in glory
故郷を慕う: (こきょうをしたう) - to pine for home
故郷忘じ難し: (こきょうぼうじがたし) - Home is always sweet to an exile
故里: (ふるさと) - home town/birthplace/native place/one's old home; (ふるさと only)  ruins/historic remains
故障: (koshou) - pane, falha, defeito, acidente, fora de serviço; dano, machucado, pane, falha, defeito, acidente, fora de serviço; dano, machucado; objeção, protesto
故障品: (こしょうひん) - broken product; faulty product
敏し: (とし) - (adj-ku)   (esp. 利し, 鋭し) sharp; (esp. 疾し, 鋭し) intense/strong/powerful; (esp. 疾し, 捷し) quick/rapid/fast; (esp. 敏し, 聆し) keen/sharp/clever
敏捷: (びんしょう) - nimble; prompt; agile; quick; shrewd; smart
敏腕を振るう: (びんわんをふるう) - to show one's competence; to demonstrate one's skill
敏腕家: (びんわんか) - capable person; shrewd person
救い: (sukui) - help, aid, relief, (religious) salvation, (Cristão) grace, providence
救いようがない: (すくいようがない) - beyond saving
救いようのない: (すくいようのない) - hopeless; irredeemable
救い上げる: (すくいあげる) - to pick up and rescue
救い出す: (すくいだす) - to rescue; to free
救い様がない: (すくいようがない) - beyond saving
救い様のない: (すくいようのない) - hopeless; irredeemable
救う: (すくう) - to rescue from; to help out of; to save
救ける: (たすける) - to help; to save; to rescue; to give relief to; to spare (life); to reinforce; to promote; to abet
救われない: (すくわれない) - beyond redemption; without hope; helpless
救出: (きゅうしゅつ) - rescue; extricate; reclaim; deliverance
救出作戦: (きゅうしゅつさくせん) - rescue mission; evacuation operation
救助網: (きゅうじょもう) - safety net; cowcatcher (train or streetcar)
救助船: (きゅうじょせん) - lifeboat; rescue ship
救助艇: (きゅうじょてい) - lifeboat; rescue boat
救助袋: (きゅうじょぶくろ) - escape chute
救助隊: (きゅうじょたい) - rescue team or party
救命いかだ: (きゅうめいいかだ) - liferaft; lifeboat
救命の鎖: (きゅうめいのくさり) - chain of survival
救命センター: (きゅうめいセンター) - hospital emergency room
救命救急センター: (きゅうめいきゅうきゅうセンター) - emergency and critical care centre (center)
救命桴: (きゅうめいいかだ) - liferaft; lifeboat
救命筏: (きゅうめいいかだ) - liferaft; lifeboat
救命胴衣: (きゅうめいどうい) - life-jacket; life-vest
救国: (きゅうこく) - patriot devoted to the salvation of his country
救国済民: (きゅうこくさいみん) - (yoji) saving a nation and providing relief to people
救急シート: (きゅうきゅうシート) - emergency blanket
救急ヘリコプター: (きゅうきゅうヘリコプター) - ambulance helicopter
救急医療: (きゅうきゅういりょう) - emergency medicine
救急患者: (きゅうきゅうかんじゃ) - emergency patient; emergency case
救急搬送: (きゅうきゅうはんそう) - emergency transport; ambulance transport
救急救命士: (きゅうきゅうきゅうめいし) - paramedic; emergency medical technician
救急法: (きゅうきゅうほう) - (knowledge of) first-aid
救急病院: (きゅうきゅうびょういん) - emergency hospital
救急箱: (きゅうきゅうばこ) - first-aid kit
救急隊員: (きゅうきゅうたいいん) - rescue worker; emergency rescue team member
救援投手: (きゅうえんとうしゅ) - relief pitcher; fireman
救援活動: (きゅうえんかつどう) - rescue operation
救援物資: (きゅうえんぶっし) - relief supplies
救援軍: (きゅうえんぐん) - reinforcements; relief column
救援隊: (きゅうえんたい) - relief party; rescue party
